vendor_name: Fairmont La Marina Rabat Salé Hotel And Residences
title: Glamorous Morocco Coastal Retreat with Daily Breakfast & US$100 Resort Credit
description:
Experience the magic of Morocco's capital with a mesmerising stay at the glimmering Fairmont La Marina Rabat Salé Hotel & Residences. Between cultural adventures, savour authentic Moroccan cuisine at the lively Dahlia, watch the world pass by with a cocktail in hand at Le Deck rooftop bar, or enjoy a light, locally sourced lunch at L'ecume - made for sharing. Throughout your stay, reserve a moment for rejuvenation at the world-class spa boasting an extensive lineup of facilities and treatments from restorative massages to a traditional hammam and a sparkling outdoor pool.

Set along the banks of the Bouregreg River, steps from the seafront and minutes from the vibrant city centre, you'll be perfectly positioned to explore the best of Rabat, a UNESCO World Heritage site, home to breathtaking cultural sites including the iconic Medina and the Mausoleum of Mohammed V.
